001package io.jstach.jstachio.spi;
002
003import static io.jstach.jstachio.spi.Templates.sneakyThrow;
004
005import java.io.IOException;
006import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
007
008import io.jstach.jstachio.JStachio;
009import io.jstach.jstachio.TemplateInfo;
010import io.jstach.jstachio.spi.JStachioFilter.FilterChain;
011
012/**
013 * An abstract jstachio that just needs a {@link JStachioExtensions} container.
014 * <p>
015 * To extend just override {@link #extensions()}.
016 *
017 * @see JStachioExtensions
018 * @author agentgt
019 */
020public abstract class AbstractJStachio implements JStachio, JStachioExtensions.Provider {
021
022        /**
023         * Do nothing constructor
024         */
025        public AbstractJStachio() {
026
027        }
028
029        @Override
030        public void execute(Object model, Appendable appendable) throws IOException {
031                TemplateInfo template = template(model.getClass());
032                var filter = loadFilter(model, template);
033                filter.process(model, appendable);
034
035        }
036
037        /**
038         * Loads the filter and checks if it can process the model and template.
039         * @param model to render
040         * @param template loaded by {@link #template(Class)}
041         * @return filter chain that can process model
042         * @throws IOException if the filter cannot process the model
043         */
044        protected FilterChain loadFilter(Object model, TemplateInfo template) throws IOException {
045                var filter = extensions().getFilter().filter(template);
046                if (filter.isBroken(model)) {
047                        boolean isReflectiveTemplate = Templates.isReflectionTemplate(template);
048                        final String ind = "\n\t";
049                        String reason = "";
050                        if (isReflectiveTemplate) {
051                                reason = " This is usually because the template "
052                                                + "has not been compiled and reflection based rendering is not available.";
053                        }
054                        throw new BrokenFilterException( //
055                                        "Filter chain unable to process template/model." + reason //
056                                                        + ind + "template: \"" + template.description() + "\"" //
057                                                        + ind + "model type: \"" + model.getClass() + "\"" //
058                                                        + ind + "reflection used: \"" + isReflectiveTemplate + "\"");
059                }
060                return filter;
061        }
062
063        @Override
064        public StringBuilder execute(Object model, StringBuilder sb) {
065                try {
066                        execute(model, (Appendable) sb);
067                        return sb;
068                }
069                catch (IOException e) {
070                        sneakyThrow(e);
071                        throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
072                }
073        }
074
075        @Override
076        public String execute(Object model) {
077                return execute(model, new StringBuilder()).toString();
078        }
079
080        @Override
081        public boolean supportsType(Class<?> modelType) {
082                return extensions().getTemplateFinder().supportsType(modelType);
083        }
084
085        /**
086         * Finds the template by model class
087         * @param modelType the class of the model.
088         * @return found template never <code>null</code>.
089         */
090        protected TemplateInfo template(Class<?> modelType) {
091                try {
092                        return extensions().getTemplateFinder().findTemplate(modelType);
093                }
094                catch (Exception e) {
095                        sneakyThrow(e);
096                        throw new RuntimeException(e);
097                }
098        }
099
100}
101
102class DefaultJStachio extends AbstractJStachio {
103
104        private final JStachioExtensions extensions;
105
106        public DefaultJStachio(JStachioExtensions extensions) {
107                super();
108                this.extensions = extensions;
109        }
110
111        @Override
112        public JStachioExtensions extensions() {
113                return this.extensions;
114        }
115
116}
